sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A dirge for the directory. Written by one of King Iames ancient Protestants One of King James ancient Protestants.
[2], 6 p.
Printed by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the Vniversity of Oxford., Oxford, [i.e. London] : 1645.
The imprint is false. "It is really printed in London, the Oxford imprint being counterfeited. The printing is too rude for Lichfield's press."--Madan. Annotation on Thomason copy: "July 18th". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[2], 6 p.
Printed by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the Vniversity of Oxford., Oxford, [i.e. London] : 1645.
The imprint is false. "It is really printed in London, the Oxford imprint being counterfeited. The printing is too rude for Lichfield's press."--Madan. Annotation on Thomason copy: "July 18th". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
the Vniversity of Oxford.
Leonard Lichfield
